section: The business name of the Venture will be BM&V2GO.
explanation: The purpose of the venture is to be determined by the managers, but the agreement does not specify when this determination should be made. This lack of a defined timeframe could lead to disagreements or delays in starting the venture's operations, creating an inconsistency in the text.

section:
Each of the Members has contributed to the capital of the Venture, in cash or property in agreed upon value, as follows (the "Capital Contribution"):
Member Contribution Description Agreed Value
BorrowMoney.com, inc To be determined USD
JVLS, LLC dba Vaccines 2Go $60,000.00 USD From Monthly Government , City And State, And Or Private Awarded Contracts. Plus (10%) Of Any Generated Gross Revenue, In Add i t i on to The To ta l Contributions. $3,500,000.00 USD
explanation: There is a discrepancy in the Capital Contributions section regarding BorrowMoney.com, inc. The agreed value of their contribution is stated as "To be determined USD," which is ambiguous and incomplete. This creates an in-text contradiction as it doesn't specify the actual value or how it will be determined, making it difficult to ascertain each member's financial commitment to the venture.

section: In the absence of a written agreement setting a value, the value of the Venture will be determined in a manner deemed appropriate by the remaining members. A withdrawing Member's interest will be determined at the discretion of the remaining members.
explanation: This section allows the remaining members to determine the value of a withdrawing member's interest at their discretion. This is a structural flaw in legal terms as it does not provide a clear, objective method for valuation and creates potential for unfair or biased valuations, which could be subject to legal challenge.
